definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: Here too, public universities charge more for out-of-state tuition.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，公立大學收取非本州學生更多學費。

sentences.english: Here in L.A., installation is charged separately.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉磯，安裝費都是分開來收取的。

sentences.english: Smaller companies are working on subscription and fee models as well.
sentences.chinese: 較小的公司也開始採用收取會員費和使用費的模式。

sentences.english: An additional HKD100. - monthly fee will be charged if Diners Club is to be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 如選擇接受大來信用證，將額外收取月費港幣壹佰圓。

sentences.english: He seriously debated whether or not he should charge his tenants extra for the water.
sentences.chinese: 他認真地考慮該不該向房客們收取額外的水費。

sentences.english: Yet every morning there was God's provision waiting to be gathered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，到每天清晨，神卻預備了食物供他們收取。

sentences.english: Taxi fares are chargeable by offline credit card via the internet.
sentences.chinese: 的士車費會透過離線方式以信用咭收取。

sentences.english: Joint ventures shall not pay foreign currency or foreign exchange certificate to the aforesaid establishments.
sentences.chinese: 不得向合營企業收取外幣或外匯兌換券。

sentences.english: It also means they can charge you fees for the long term.
sentences.chinese: 這也意味着他們可以向你收取長期費用。

sentences.english: They are usually free although some may charge a small entrance fee.
sentences.chinese: 這些俱樂部通常是免費的，少部分會收取少量入門費。

sentences.english: Fees will be charged for real-time quotes of Hong Kong Stocks only, details are enclosed overleaf.
sentences.chinese: 將僅就港股即時報價收取費用，收費詳情載於背頁。

sentences.english: Allows a carrier to lawfully charge a negotiated, non-tariff rate.
sentences.chinese: 允許承運人合法地收取已達成協議的，非運價本運價。

sentences.english: And the prices the milkman charges will go up as well.
sentences.chinese: 當然，送奶工收取的價格也會上升。

sentences.english: Specific procedures for charging litigation fees shall be prescribed separately.
sentences.chinese: 收取訴訟費用的具體辦法另行規定。

sentences.english: The customs shall charge issuance fee in accordance with the provisions.
sentences.chinese: 海關按規定收取簽證費。

definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to receive sth on another's behalf
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
